attributes.action: Introduce: pay as you go council services (replacing standard council tax billing system) in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if you don't use the services which you are paying for as listed on your council tax bill (ie. fire services, police etc), you don't pay for/get charged their services as you do currently. Pay-as you go council 'service' charges (and not upping current cost to you, the public either...)

this to replace the exisiting council tax 'charges' which we as the public get charged for each year.
